php.LBL_YETIFORCE_STATUS_DESC: Page de configuration du service d'état YetiForce
php.LBL_YETIFORCE_STATUS_FULL_DESC: The status mechanism monitors the CRM system work and transfers selected information to YetiForce Sp. z o.o. All collected information will not be published and is intended only to monitor the CRM system for incorrect operation and the environment on which it is installed.
php.LBL_REGISTRATION_OFFLINE_DESC: To register a version of the system that has no access to the Internet send an email to %s with the following data
php.LBL_REGISTRATION_OFFLINE_EXAMPLE:
Objet: YetiForce enregistrement hors ligne

Message :
Enregistrement CRM :
Le nom de votre entreprise :
Pays :
Ville :
Le nombre d'employés de la société :
Le site web de votre entreprise :
Clé produit : %s 
ID Instance : %s
php.LBL_SUCCESSFUL_TRANSACTION: Thank you for making the payment. The transaction is being processed, purchased functions will be added to your system once we receive the payment.
php.LBL_FAILED_TRANSACTION: Transaction failed or was cancelled, please check the payment on your PayPal account and try again.
php.LBL_SIZE_OF_YOUR_COMPANY_HAS_CHANGED: The size of your company has changed, the purchased package is too small for the current size. Update your subscription.
